product_name: Big Agnes Triple Core Air Pad - Regular - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Thick, warm and ultra-comfortable, this 4-season pad combines a layer of closed-cell foam on top of an air chamber, making it ideal for winter camping or for spoiling yourself on summer camping trips.
short_description: Thick, warm and ultra-comfortable, this 4-season pad combines a layer of closed-cell foam on top of an air chamber, making it ideal for winter camping or for spoiling yourself on summer camping trips.
